mapper.sql: BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME, CHANNEL_NO, CHANNEL_NAME, BUSI_SCORE, QUALITY_SCORE, SATIS_SCORE, SUCCESS_RATE, COVER_RATE
mapper.select:
select a.BRANCH_NO,a.BRANCH_NAME,ELE_COUNT,trunc(ELE_COUNT/decode(COUNT,0,1,COUNT)*100) ELE_REPLACE_RATE from ( SELECT BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME,SUM(BUSI_COUNT) COUNT FROM DM_BUSI_COUNT_TB
RECORD_TIME between to_date(#{params.START_TIME},'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{params.END_TIME},'yyyymmdd')
group by BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME )a full join ( SELECT BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME,SUM(BUSI_COUNT) ELE_COUNT FROM DM_BUSI_COUNT_TB WHERE CHANNEL_NO <> 'CH000'
and RECORD_TIME between to_date(#{params.START_TIME},'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{params.END_TIME},'yyyymmdd')
group by BRANCH_NO,BRANCH_NAME ) b on a.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO order by ELE_REPLACE_RATE desc

select CHANNEL_NO,CHANNEL_NAME,
sum(REPLACE_RATE)/count(1) as count
REPLACE_RATE
from DM_CHANNEL_ELE_RPL_RATE_TB
BRANCH_NO = #{params.BRANCH_NO}
GROUP BY CHANNEL_NO,CHANNEL_NAME
